TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowCompiler extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 表示工作流程的編譯器，這些工作流程是使用 C# 或 Visual Basic 程式碼和/或 XAML 標記所開發的。

span.span: Represents the compiler for workflows that are developed using C# or Visual Basic code and/or XAML markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立 類別的新執行個體，並執行 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the class and run the method. 程式碼也會建立 類別的新執行個體，並設定它的某些值。The code also creates a new instance of the class and sets some of its values. 這段程式碼假設 `results` 的型別為 。This code assumes that `results` is of type . 這個程式碼範例是 WizardForm.cs 檔案中＜Outlook 工作流程精靈 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Outlook Workflow Wizard SDK sample from the WizardForm.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Outlook 工作流程精靈](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408)。For more information, see [Outlook Workflow Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408). MemberSignature.Value: public System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerResults Compile (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerParameters parameters, params string[] files);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerResults Compile(class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerParameters parameters, string[] files) cil managed
Public Function Compile (parameters As WorkflowCompilerParameters, ParamArray files As String()) As WorkflowCompilerResults

param.name: files
param.span: 字串陣列，包含要編譯之檔案的路徑。

span.span: A string array that contains the paths to the files to compile.

param.span: 這些檔案可以是程式碼檔案 (例如 .vb 或 .cs) 或工作流程標記檔案。

span.span: These files can be either code files (such as .vb or .cs) or workflow markup files.

param.span: 工作流程標記檔案的副檔名必須是編譯器可辨識的 .xoml 副檔名。

span.span: Workflow markup files must have an .xoml extension to be recognized by the compiler.

summary.span: 編譯包含在檔案中的工作流程清單，這些工作流程會根據 當做參數傳遞。

span.span: Compiles a list of workflows contained in the files that are passed as parameters based on the .
The representing the results of the operation.
